name: Kung Fu Milo
description:
in Kung Fu MIlo you play as milo as he is on a quest to get home and eat food. one day after milo discovered a short cut to his house through an alley way milo decided to take it but little did, he know the route he would take would be infested with mutant rats.

HOW TO PLAY: milo takes charge against the rats in a Rythm based fighting style. he attacks with whichever arrow key is prompted to press as you see the rats walk towards you. its best to fight back or else its game over.
